mapper.select: SELECT mr_id AS mrId , mr_pw AS mrPw , mr_name AS mrName , level_num AS levelNum , mr_phone AS mrPhone , mr_addr AS mrAddr , mr_target_score AS mrTargetScore , pm_r_code AS pmRCode , mr_account_num AS mrAccountNum , shuttle_num AS shuttleNum , mr_join_date AS mrJoinDate , mr_reg_date AS mrRegDate FROM wt_member_registration;
